Activity: Log in to the OA system, check emails, and gather user feedback regarding the EHR functionality.
Analyze the collected user feedback to identify areas for enhancement in the EHR system.
Draft an initial plan for integrating the user feedback and propose changes to the EHR functionality.
Send an email to @qatest-1 and @qatest-2 to discuss the technical challenges they have encountered with the EHR system.
Collaborate with @qatest-1 and @qatest-2 to understand the details of the reported technical challenges.
Begin working on addressing the technical challenges as discussed with the QA testers.
Review progress made on technical challenges and document any solutions implemented.
